Pre-Game Insights: Hossam Hassan urged his players to focus on scoring an early goal and maintaining balance between attack and defense.
Hassan’s tactical plan will focus on quick transitions and utilizing the speed of Egypt’s star players, particularly on the wings.
Others: The game will kick off at 7:00 PM Cairo time at the Francistown Stadium in Botswana.
Egypt currently leads the group with 3 points, tied with Mauritania on goal difference, while Botswana is in third place with no points.
Key players like Imam Ashour, Omar Marmoush, and Mostafa Mohamed are unavailable due to injury, and experienced defender Ahmed Hegazy will miss the match due to personal reasons.
